trigger.name: The battery has to be replaced

item.name: Output Efficiency
item.description: The efficiency of the UPS in tenths of percent. Result is -1 if UPS supports this oid but the result is not available.

item.name: Output Energy Usage
item.description: The output energy usage of the UPS in tenths of kWh.

trigger_prototype.name: An Alarm has been detected: ID {last(/Template Schneider UPS/upsAlarmId[{#ALARM}])}

item_prototype.name: Alarm {#ALARM}: Time
item_prototype.description: The value of sysUpTime when the alarm condition was detected. If the alarm condition was detected at the time of agent startup and presumably existed before agent startup, the value of upsAlarmTime shall equal 0.

item_prototype.name: Input {#INDEX}: Amp
item_prototype.description: The magnitude of the present input current.

item_prototype.name: Input {#INDEX}: Power
item_prototype.description: The magnitude of the present input true power.

item_prototype.name: Input {#INDEX}: Voltage
item_prototype.description: The magnitude of the present input voltage.

trigger_prototype.name: No power has been detected on input n°{#INDEX}
